title: Risk & Adventure

questions.text: When it comes to trying new things together, I hope we...
choices: Push each other out of our comfort zones
Take turns picking adventures for each other
Find new things we're both curious about
Balance adventure with plenty of cozy familiar stuff
Other / It depends

questions.text: For a trip together, I'd be most excited about...
choices: Exploring somewhere completely new to both of us
A mix of adventure during the day and relaxation at night
A laid-back trip where we can just be together
Surprising each other with parts of the itinerary
Other / It depends

questions.text: When we're picking where to eat, I'd love it if we...
choices: Always try somewhere new and adventurous
Take turns choosing - your pick, then mine
Have a few 'our spots' we keep coming back to
Mix it up based on our mood that day
Other / It depends

questions.text: Something I'd love for us to learn or try together is...
choices: Something active or adventurous - a sport, dancing, climbing
Something creative - cooking, art, music
Something chill - a new show, game nights, a hobby we can do side by side
I'm open to anything if we're doing it together
Other / It depends

questions.text: When it comes to spending on experiences together, I tend to think...
choices: Life's short - let's splurge on memories
Save up for one big thing we're both excited about
Plenty of great dates don't cost much
Let's figure out what matters most to us and spend there
Other / It depends

description: Discover how adventurous you want to be together.
